title: What Went Wrong With Cyberpunk 2077 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.18.21
description:
Blessing and Tim kick off the week by talking about a new report from Jason Schreier detailing what went wrong with CD Projekt Red and Cyberpunk 2077.

00:00:00 - Start
00:03:00 - Housekeeping
In case you missed it: The Blessing Show episode 1 is available right now over on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames. I give out my NON-GOTY awards. Check out that episode if you want to know what that’s about. The next episode of The Blessing Show is coming this Thursday, and I won’t spoil what it’s about. I’ll just say it’s a “Killer” episode. Also note, after this week, The Blessing Show episodes will be every other Thursday.
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:04:10 - What went wrong with Cyberpunk 2077 - Matt Kim @ IGN
00:30:55 - What’s up with Sony’s mysterious new studio? - Ali Jones @ GamesRadar
00:34:45 - How successful do you think this strategy will be? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:42:50 - Ninja Gaiden’s Tomonobu Itagaki establishes new studio - Marie Deallesandri @ GiBiz
00:47:20 -  Ad
00:49:15 - Hitman is working on a solution to its PC problem - John Fingas @ Engadget
00:55:00 - Out today
00:58:19 - Squad Up:Gary(PS4) - gblastr
00:58:52 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary
